title: Trust
description: Guarantees on validity of allocations, information, and markets across California all provided by a single network.

title: Transparency
description: Auditability and transparency only when you need it. All information is stored on the network, but is only shared when there is an issue.

title: Transfer
description: Moving digital water should be cheap and easy. Assets on Basin Logix have dynamic value and information which are linked together.
